name: SuperheroInfo
0:
”Alexa, open super info”
”Alexa, ask super info who is goku?”
”Alexa, ask super info who will win between batman and superman?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: super info
des:
Superhero Info is a skill mainly for kids. It does as its name suggests, i.e., providing information of more than 700 superheroes! You can know more about your favorite ones or explore the less known heroes.
Compare two superheroes in terms of their powers, know their publishers, birthplace, appearance, family details or know more about their ordinary jobs.
This skill will keep kids engaged and help you answer the complex questions like
Who will win the fight? Batman or Superman?

How to use the skill?
Just use the phrases:
Ask super info who is Hulk?
Ask super info How tall is Batman?
Ask super info who will win between Batman and Superman?
Ask super info who published Spiderman?
Ask super info where was Batman born?
Ask super info what does Captain America do?
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
